name: A Race To Save Space
description:
In this game you play as a  careless agent who has to prevent a nuclear bomb from going off by downloading an app. But careless of you, your phone has no more space and it's up to you to delete apps to make space. Be careful, some apps are viruses.

This entire game is made by Alexander Tan Zheng Fang(Me) under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 42

Programming: visual studios and unity

Art: Paint.net

Sound: www.soundtrap.com  (Sound engine)

There is one bug i'm not to sure how to fix, it is the UI. It changes on different phones due to aspect ratio.  The source code is provided, so feel free to take a look and i know a lot of it was hard coding but I was pressed for time.

Anyways, I hope you enjoy.
